pageContext.claim: “I feel masks possibly work, but certainly you want to stay away, a certain distance, socially distance, etcetera. But, I would say a mask works, and I have nothing against masks, and I tell people to wear masks. I don't have a problem....A lot of people [at Trump's rallies] are wearing masks, and they're outside....I tell people to wear masks.”
pageContext.analysis: Interviewer Lesley Stahl made the observation that relatively few people at Trump's rallies wore masks: "I'm seeing most of them without masks." Trump himself has been very inconsistent in promoting mask usage.
